net.rim.device.api.browser.field
Class ExecutingScriptEvent

java.lang.Object
  net.rim.device.api.browser.field.Event
      net.rim.device.api.browser.field.ExecutingScriptEvent

public class ExecutingScriptEvent
extends Event

Event indicating browser field is executing a script.

Category:
Signed: This element is only accessible by signed applications. If you intend to use this element, please visit http://www.blackberry.com/go/codesigning to obtain a set of code signing keys. Code signing is only required for applications running on BlackBerry smartphones; development on BlackBerry Smartphone Simulators can occur without code signing.
Since:
BlackBerry API 4.0.0

Field Summary
static int TYPE_JAVASCRIPT
          Script executing is in Javascript.

          Script executing is in WMLscript.
